questions.question: Set on a winter island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' conflict with a corrupt royal family and a rebel army. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's desperate battle at Marineford to save his brother Ace, leading to a war between the Marines and Whitebeard's pirates. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to transform into a large bird and control ice. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
